about_the_game:
This game is for maniacs who are no longer satisfied with the conventional difficulty level.
It is a super gritty simultaneous turn-based strategy simulation game produced by a team of developers with more than 20 years of SRPG experience.
However, the difficulty level is selective, and various remedies are available, so it is not so difficult if you just clear it normally
However, the complete capture rate, including all high-difficulty missions and replay elements, is about 1%.
If you try to do everything, it will be quite difficult.
You can enjoy it as a good SRPG even in normal play.
If you are a player who has your own skills, please try to complete the strategy.
There, a supreme SRPG experience awaits you.

This work contains some minor sexual depictions.
In addition, depictions of violence are present.
Thank you for your understanding.
